summary: Build an AI-forward, technologically advanced investment website branded as “NexaProfit” with a black and red color theme.
known_issues: Pricing/investment plans section sometimes shows no plans due to frontend actor/canister connection (useActor/agent) not initializing or loading before data fetch, resulting in an empty plans list.

existing_features.title: Create a responsive investment marketing website with a consistent black-and-red visual theme and an “AI technologically advanced” aesthetic (dark UI, high-contrast red accents, modern typography, subtle glow/scanline/grid motifs).

Implement core website pages/sections with clear investment-site information architecture: hero, product overview, AI-driven features, performance/analytics preview, plans/pricing, FAQs, and a contact/lead capture section.

Add an “AI Insights” experience that feels technologically advanced without using external AI/LLM integrations: show sample signals (e.g., trend strength, volatility, sentiment index), confidence scores, and short generated-by-system explanations sourced from the canister.
Wire the frontend to the backend using React Query for data fetching and loading/error states (skeletons/spinners) that match the black/red theme.

Add subtle, performant “tech” micro-interactions (hover states, animated chart lines/bars, gradient/glow transitions) that reinforce the AI-forward brand while remaining accessible (reduced motion support).
Include a prominent disclaimer section/footer copy stating the site is a demo and not financial advice.

Add a lead capture form (name, email, message) that validates inputs client-side and stores submissions in the backend for demo purposes (with a simple list retrieval for admin-like viewing in the UI).
Add basic SEO and polish: meaningful page title, meta description, favicon, and consistent section headings.
